description:
If your using After Effects you need to take this course on Green Screening

Green screening is commonly used now days and pretty easy to do once you know the basic, in this course we will look at a simple set up to get great results keying in After Effects.

This course is for everyone from special effects to presentations these skills will help you out and make your presentation and movies even better!!

As well as showing you my techiniques for Green Screening I will also show you a few special effects that can easily be created in After Effects!

Creating Lightening: In this tutorial I will show you my technique for Green Screening and also show you how to track movement and attac h a lightening effect to the tracks!

Demons Eyes: In this scary tutorial you will speed through the learnt green screening techniques and move straingt on to a more advanced form of tracking, the end goal will be to create scary Demon eyes!!

Whos it for?

  • Beginners

What will I learn?

  • Green screening and lighting setups
  • Green Screen techniques in After Effects
  • Motion Tracking using the native tracker and more advanced techniques with Mocha
  • Special Effects
  • The use of comps
  • Importing anf exporting
  • Loads more...

I hope you enjoy this course very much it was great fun to do!!
Also sorry for the subject matter ME!!!! feel free to use you own :)
title: Green Screen Keying Techniques with Adobe After Effects CC
